function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Features facilitating rapid conversion of large public venues","Impact":"Failure to rapidly convert venues may result in delayed response to contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement modular and flexible interior design features to facilitate rapid conversion of public venues.","Technologies":"Modular construction, flexible MEP infrastructure, component systems for construction.","People":"Designers, architects, and construction teams.","Owner":"Public health authorities, venue owners, and architects."},{"Description":"Requirement for specific space and infrastructure for medical facilities","Impact":"Inadequate space or infrastructure may hinder the functionality of medical facilities in responding to contagious disease outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive space and infrastructure planning to ensure the necessary facilities, equipment, and services are available in the converted venues.","Technologies":"Space planning software, modular infrastructure systems, MEP design and planning.","People":"Medical facility planners, architects, and construction teams.","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility operators, and architects."},{"Description":"Cross-infection risk in the built environment","Impact":"Inadequate ventilation systems and layout may increase the risk of cross-infection among patients and medical staff.","Mitigation":"Implement advanced ventilation systems, strategically plan layout to reduce cross-infection, and prioritize infection control measures.","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, infection control technology, layout optimization.","People":"Architects, engineers, and infection control specialists.","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, and architects."}]}
